publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee’s 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221).

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee’s 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221).

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee's 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221).
S1M-1392 Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill (lodged on 23 November 2000) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee's 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221). Supported by: Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1392 Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill (lodged on 23 November 2000) Pauline McNeill*

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee's 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221). Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-1392 Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill (lodged on 23 November 2000) Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice and Home Affairs Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee’s 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221). Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Mr John McAllion, Maureen Macmillan

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice I Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee’s 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221). Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Mr John McAllion, Maureen Macmillan

S1M-1392 Alasdair Morgan on behalf of the Justice I Committee: Proposal for a Protection from Abuse Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Justice and Home Affairs Committee’s 9th Report, 2000 (SP Paper 221).
